title: Track and field for intermediate grades (TEFC)
creator_credit: Dave Turkington and Universal Education and Visual Arts
brief_description: Shows how track and field activities may be taught either in a gym or out-of-doors. Emphasises attentionto improving inexpensive indoor jumping pits, hurdles, and other indoor equipment.
